messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory]:  Sword metals?   Prof Murphy---for Barry warlord
messages.msgSnippet: It certainly sounds as if I have got up the nose of the good ProfMurf!!  Sorry, I should have made it clear that my comments referred to the Bronze Age/Iron
messages.messageBody:
It certainly sounds as if I have got up the nose of the good ProfMurf!! Sorry,
I should have made it clear that my comments referred to the Bronze Age/Iron Age
transition in Europe and Asia Minor, and NOT Japan. Apologies again.

Barry Thomas.

----- Original Message -----
From: <murphymurphyjohn@...>
To: <samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 04, 2003 5:25 AM
Subject: Re: [samuraihistory]: Sword metals? Prof Murphy---for Barry warlord


The warlord is really making a contribution! I am sure we all can benefit
from more news about his ongoing research into Japanese swords and sword
metallurgy. Congratulations, Barry, Prof Murf
